snippet: A recent report found spending on sports is outpacing educational expenditures not only in Division I, the most competitive level, but in small institutions and community colleges.
abstract: American Association of University Professors report finds spending on sports is outpacing educational expenditures at colleges not only in competitive Division I level, but in smaller institutions and community colleges as well.
lead_paragraph: A recent report found spending on sports is outpacing educational expenditures not only in Division I, the most competitive level, but in small institutions and community colleges.

headline.main: Colleges Increasing Spending on Sports Faster Than on Academics, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Colleges Increasing Spending on Sports Faster Than on Academics, Report Finds
